snippet: After a seven-hour gunfight in Paktika Province, three police officers and four government workers, as well as the three assailants, were dead.
abstract: Three suicide attackers storm government building in Paktika Province, Afghanistan, setting off seven-hour gunfight that leaves 10 people dead, including the attackers.

byline.original: By GRAHAM BOWLEY and SHARIFULLAH SAHAK
byline.contributor: Farouq Jan Mangal contributed reporting from Khost, Afghanistan.

lead_paragraph: After a seven-hour gunfight in Paktika Province, three police officers and four government workers, as well as the three assailants, were dead.

headline.seo: Suicide Attack at Government Building in Afghanistan Kills 7
headline.main: Suicide Attackers Storm Afghan Government Building
headline.print_headline: Suicide Attackers Storm Afghan Government Building
